Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of La2NiO4-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 composite cathode material with Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 electrolyte and Ni-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 anode has been studied.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test

Sentencas: Powders of La2NiO4 were prepared by a nitrate-citrate route whereas commercial Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 was used to prepare the electrolyte and composites/cermets of cathode and anode, respectively.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test

Sentencas: Fuel cell tests were performed with stationary air as oxidant and humidified hydrogen as fuel using single cells with 450 mu m-thick electrolytes.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test

Sentencas: Values of maximum power density higher than 130, 200 and 275 mW cm(-2) were obtained for temperatures of 750, 800 and 850 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy under open cell voltage (OCV) conditions and with different current loads was used as a complementary tool to study the different contributions to the voltage loss of the system.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test

Sentencas: The ohmic loss was revealed as the main important contribution to the internal voltage loss of the single cell even at lower temperatures due to the use of a 450 mu m-thick electrolyte.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test

Sentencas: Decreasing the electrolyte thickness to values in the order of 150 mu m is expected to produce a decrease higher than 45% in the total cell resistance under OCV conditions, improving the maximum power density to 190 mW cm-2 at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test

Sentencas: The performance of the cell was affected by the hydrogen flux as was made evident by changing the flow rate of the fuel in the range 8-66 ml min(-1).
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test

Sentencas: An increase higher than 20% in the maximum power density was directly obtained by simply increasing the hydrogen flux from 8 to 66 ml min(-1).
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test

Sentencas: However, the increase in the hydrogen flow rate produced a decrease in the fuel utilisation.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test

Sentencas: Very good stability of the single cell was also obtained after operation times higher than 40 h with the cell producing the maximum power density.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance of La2NiO4-based Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells. Single Cell Test
